start:
Welcome to the Telegram bot!
It has been created to help you find the dream tour. Enjoy!
If you are looking for a tour, please click the 'Find tour' button and to change language click the 'Choose language'.
Thanks for joining!

other.about:
Telegram bot for tour agencies with auth system, admin panel, role based access for crud using forms. Stack: telegraf, mysql, typescript, typeorm, express.

You can visit github repository to view the code, submit issues and make pull requests.

Find me by *olehcambel*
